segments.text: Hi , Kenny . Let's go for a drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . Where are we going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Somewhere new . It's a great place to pick up chicks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I broke up with Lisa.She blew a gasket over it . Whoa , get a load of that !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never mind the getup.She ' s beautiful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're lucky , that might do the trick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , oh , that tears it ! I'm getting out of here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hold on ! What's the big hurry ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My ex-girlfriend's here.If she sees me , my goose is cooked .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wanna finish my drink first . I'll meet you at Sammy's .
segments.speaker: S2
